MoonChief.test: This is a test from the mighty Moon Chief of the Moon at Midnight Tribe
MoonChief.taunt: Come! I shall grant you a swift death.
MoonChief.bf2: Hold firm, stranger! I have come to aid you!
MoonChief.bf4: I am Moon Chief of the Moon at Midnight tribe.
MoonChief.bf6: Then join me, Wildman, as Blue Moon of the Moon at Midnight tribe.
MoonChief.bf8: The forest is safe, the tribe shall defend it.
MoonChief.mam1: Who dares to attack our tribe!?

Wildman.bf_battle_2: A warrior? You're a welcome sight!
Wildman.bf_battle_3: By the might of the Blue Forest, they shall fall!
Wildman.bf_battle_5: And your style is unmatched! You strike like a bird diving into water!
Wildman.bf_battle_6: I am Wildman of the Blue Forest. And you?
Wildman.bf_battle_8: For the Blue Forest, we shall prevail!
Wildman.bf_victory_2: That we are! Never been so thankful for outsiders, but you saved me there.
Wildman.bf_victory_6: No, I am the defender of this forest.
Wildman.bf_victory_8: Hahaha! You are an interesting one indeed!

BlueMoon.mam2: They are indeed as beautiful as they say.

RabidBandit.bf_boss1_dogs: Murderous dogs! You slaughtered them all!
RabidBandit.bf_boss2_where1: Where were you when the Rays of Gold massacred us!
RabidBandit.bf_boss2_where2: Where were you when we were slain!
RabidBandit.bf_boss3_choice: What choice did we have! We had to eat!
RabidBandit.bf_boss3_curse1: Curse you! Heartless dogs! Curse you both!
RabidBandit.bf_boss3_brethren: Come on my brethren! Kill them!
